title: 1953–54 Dundee United F.C. season
text:
The 1953–54 season was the 46th year of <a href="Association%20football">football</a> played by <a href="Dundee%20United%20F.C.">Dundee United</a>, and covers the period from 1 July 1953 to 30 June 1954. United finished in fifteenth place in the Second Division.
Match results.
Dundee United played a total of 37 competitive matches during the 1953–54 season.
Legend.
All results are written with Dundee United's score first.
Own goals in italics
